alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 06 at 8:26AM EDT until June 06 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HI FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 038, 039, 040, 043, 044, 047, 048, AND 072... The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 8 PM EDT this evening. This upgrades the Fire Weather Watch previously in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 038, 039, 040. This includes Bradford, Susquehanna and Northern Wayne counties. * WIND...Northwest 15 to 20 mph, with gusts to 25 mph, especially over the higher terrain. * HUMIDITY...As low as 25 to 30 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming
